title: As a User, I want to see Columns Added to the Winter League Requests Report
custom_preconds:
Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/WLR+Report+Details
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to run the Winter League Requests Report
custom_expected:
THEN the following fields should be added to the Winter League Request Report:
 - ebisID
 - Current 40-Man (Y/N) (includes 60 day IL) 
 - 40-Man (Y/N) at time of request (includes 60 day IL) 
 - Birth Country
AND the fields should be populated correctly for players shown

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to add Club Contacts to an Employee Permission Request after the request has been approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved Employee Permission Request exists
AND a user from the Receiving Club with EE request admin permissions is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the approved request
custom_expected:
THEN receiving Club Admin with edit permissions should see an Edit button when a request submitted to them is in Active or Active (Ext) state
AND clicking the Edit button should load the form into edit mode
AND the only fields available for the Receiving Club to edit while the request is in Active or Active (Ext) should be the Current Club contacts
AND user Should be able to add new contacts and delete or change existing contacts

title: As a Inquiring Club User, I want to see the Designated Employee Negotiator on the Request Form
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary
GIVEN a user with EE perm request permission is logged in
AND inquiring user is attempting to create or update an EE perm request for an employee
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Employee Permission Request form
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a new "Employee Negotiator" field added
AND this field should not be editable
AND it should display the name of the designated Employee Negotiator
AND the field should be visible in all states, for all users
AND this field should be snapshot at the time of submission
AND if the Negotiator is changed while the Request is in flight, it should stay with the original Negotiator

title: As a BOC User, I want the Employee Permission Form PDFs updated in ebis
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with EE permission request perms
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to an EE perm request
custom_expected:
THEN the PDFs attached to the linked pivotal story will take the place of the following PDFs currently in ebis:
  -- Employee Permission Form - Contracted
  -- Employee Permission Form - Non-Contracted
AND the new PDFs should be available on the Reporting dashboard

title: As a developer I want ebis to use Okta for authentication rather than Oauth
custom_preconds: GIVEN authentication process for EBIS has been changed to use OKTA rather than oAuth server
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to login to EBIS
custom_expected: THEN all users with permission to access EBIS should be able to login (or authenticate via rest call i.e postman etc)

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_preconds:
Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS

GIVEN EBIS needs to receive certain data points from DTS so the Drug Testing Admins can be up to speed on the progress of the test and notify clubs
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with DTR in EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the messaging queue should be set up
AND a listener to process the request should be set up
AND any updates to the request should update the request in the database

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_preconds:
Reqs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058

GIVEN EBIS needs to send/make available certain data points to DTS so the Collector can locate the player and process the request
custom_steps: WHEN the status of a Drug Test Request is updated to "Consent Signed / Test Pending"
custom_expected: THEN the messaging queue should fire and deliver the appropriate data points to DTS per requirements above

title: As a developer I want the ebis link load spring boot application to send an email when an API batch starts
custom_preconds: GIVEN an EBIS Link loader batch has been kicked off via EBIS Batches Screen UI
custom_steps: WHEN a message on the SQS queue that a batch has been kicked off is received
custom_expected: THEN the ebis link loader app should send an email to the batch notifications email list that the batch has started (including the batch name)

title: As a developer I want the ebis link load spring boot application to send an email when an API batch ends
custom_preconds: GIVEN an EBIS Link loader batch has been kicked off via EBIS Batches Screen UI
custom_steps: WHEN a message on the SQS queue that a batch has ended is received
custom_expected: THEN the ebis link loader app should send an email to the batch notifications email list that the batch has completed (including the batch name)

title: Rewrite MJC Stat Batch to use BAM Stats API
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MJC Stat batch has been rewritten to utilize the BAM Stats API
custom_expected:
THEN speed/performance should be greatly improved from previous runs
AND all bonuses/escalators should be marked earned or not correctly based on existing requirements(https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJC+Stat+batch)

title: As a User, I want to see an Org column added to the Batch Results widget on the Highmark Batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to run the Highmark batch
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the batch on the Highmark Batch screen
custom_expected:
THEN there should a batch results widget
AND the widget should have a new Org column added
AND it should appear after the Player Name column
AND when the results are exported, the Org column should be exported

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit an ebis user's email address on the BOC user accounts page
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=user_accounts_-_boc

GIVEN a user account exists in EBIS
AND BOC user is logged in with admin perms for user accounts utility
custom_steps: WHEN user loads the account on the BOC user accounts utility
custom_expected: THEN there should be an email address field on the screen which can be used to change a user's email

title: As a user I want the contract language advanced search to return results
custom_preconds: GIVEN adv search for contract language has been updated to use dbms_lob.instr (or other functions in that package, see attached story)
custom_steps: WHEN user runs adv search for contract language

title: Add June 30th Option to As Of Date Prompt on Payroll Comp Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to run the Payroll Comparison Report
custom_expected:
THEN June 30th should be an option on the prompt for "As Of"
AND choosing this prompt and running the report should generate the report using the June 30th Roster snapshot

title: As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an EBIS user would like to be able to see/modify player profiles 
AND BAMStats is down
custom_steps: WHEN system gets anything other than a 3xx response code from BAMSTATS
custom_expected: THEN EBIS should still allow the EBIS player profiles to function

title: Batch - ability to remove batch job type (actually "hide" them).
custom_preconds: GIVEN a batch is no longer needed in EBIS (e.g: ebis link Player API load batch)
custom_steps: WHEN the batch is updated to "Deleted" status in the backend
custom_expected:
THEN the batch should no longer be available on the UI
AND user should be unable to access or run the batch anywhere in EBIS
BUT historical batch runs and related info should still be stored in the DB for future reference

title: MJC stat batch takes over an hour to run every night
custom_preconds: GIVEN MJC stat batch has been re-written
custom_expected:
THEN performance and speed should be improved from previous runs
AND batch should no longer take over an hour to run
AND batch should still make all updates as expected per MJC Stat Batch Requirements(https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJC+Stat+batch)

title: As a BOC user I want to see additional information on the club dashboard on an iphone
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/bJZmJJ6
GIVEN an AMT Club user is logged in via iPhone
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to club dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN the clubs should display as mobile accordions on a phone
AND the club name should still be clickable and redirect to the Prospects dashboard with the club filter set to that org
AND clicking the expand icon should display 3 additional fields:
-Check Ins This Period
-Active Travel Authorizations
-Travel Authorizations This Period
